member.name: ISystemMediaTransportControlsInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Gets an instance of the ISystemMediaTransportControls interface for the specified window.
member.param: The top-level app window for which the ISystemMediaTransportControls interface is retrieved.
A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve.
Receives the ISystemMediaTransportControls that corresponds to the appWindow window.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Enables interoperability with a WinRT a SystemMediaTransportControls object.
This interface is implemented by the Windows.Media.SystemMediaTransportControls activation factory.
